scripts.build: docker build -t api . && docker run -p 3000:3000 api
scripts.rm_containers: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq)
scripts.push: heroku container:push web -a evening-fjord-36308 && heroku container:release web -a evening-fjord-36308
scripts.redeploy: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker build -t api . && heroku container:push web -a evening-fjord-36308 && heroku container:release web -a evening-fjord-36308
